xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 6 Kusalattika, Kilesagocchaka » 6.2 Kusalattika, Saṃkilesikaduka » 6.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Kilesagocchaka
Kusalattika, Saṃkilesikaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
6.
1448Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1449Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1450Abyākataṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1451Kusalaṃ saṃkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1452Akusalaṃ saṃkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
7.
1453Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1454(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
8.
1455Kusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1456Akusalo saṃkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1457Abyākato saṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa saṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
9.
1458Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
10.
1459Kusalaṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1460Abyākataṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
11.
1461Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1462(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
12.
1463Kusalo asaṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1464Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1465Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato asaṃkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
13.
1466Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve…pe…  upanissaye cattāri…pe…  kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1467(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
